query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST131 SET CS131_AMT = #AMT# ,CS131_VAT = #VAT# ,CS131_TOT = #TOT# ,CS131_HMT = #HMT# ,CS131_DMT = #DMT# ,CS131_ACMT = #ACMT# ,CS131_YYM = #YYM# ,CS131_YDT = SAPHEE.GET_LAST_DAY(CAST(#YYM# AS VARCHAR(18))||CAST(#YDT# AS VARCHAR(6))) ,CS131_NDT = HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,CS131_CSJ = #G_USER_ID# ,AEDAT = HEX(CURRENT DATE) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.19 Han J.H ,AEZEIT = HEX(CURRENT TIME) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.19 Han J.H WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS131_UPN = #UPN# AND CS131_CST = #CST# AND CS131_PJT = #PJT# AND CS131_HNO = #HNO# AND CS131_SEQ = #SEQ1# AND CS131_GND = #GND1# AND CS131_MYM = #JYM# AND CS131_ISR = #ISR1#
